content.demo-explain:
In this demonstration, in order to make it easy to grasp the essence of direct trade between traders, we implement only very simple selling orders and buying trade.

Implementation of buying orders and selling trade, and visualization of graphs etc. are considered to be easy to implement based on this demo.

Likewise, because of the demonstration, we use local storage for data storage.

send-complete.title: Transaction Accepted
send-complete.msg:
The transaction to send tokens is submitted to the ethereum network.
Updating the account balance may take half a minute
(until mined on the blockchain)

err-no-account.title: No Accounts Registered
err-no-account.msg:
DEMO accounts have not been registered.
Did you create following accounts on your local storage?

* Issuer Account
* Indexer Account
* Trader-A Account
* Trader-B Account

err-token-name-too-long.title: Input Error
err-token-name-too-long.msg: Token name's length must be 32bytes or less.

err-self-trade.title: Self Trade
err-self-trade.msg: This selling record is trader's own record.

err-lack-token.title: Lack Token
err-lack-token.msg: If you want to do a DEMO trade, you have to create 2 or more tokens.

err-not-int.title: Not Integer
err-not-int.msg: Trade target token volume must be set as a integer number.

err-trade.title: Trade Error
err-trade.msg: Failed to trade. Check parameters please.

err-allowance-short.title: Allowance Shortage
err-allowance-short.msg: You can not set a trade allowance that is less than the amount of On Order.

allowance-complete.title: Allowance Transaction Accepted
allowance-complete.msg:
Sending allowance transaction is submitted to ethereum network.
Updating the account balance may take half a minute
(until mined on the blockchain)

err-over-remain.title: Over Sales Volume
err-over-remain.msg: The specified number exceeds the sales volume.

err-tradable-shortage.title: Shortage Amount
err-tradable-shortage.msg:
There is insufficient tradable amount.

Increase trade allowance and adjust tradable amount.

err-tradable-taker-shortage.title: Shortage Trade Allowance
err-tradable-taker-shortage.msg:
There is insufficient tradable amount for buying.

Increase trade allowance and adjust tradable amount.

err-tradable-maker-shortage.title: Maker Shortage Amount
err-tradable-maker-shortage.msg:
There is insufficient tradable amount for selling.

Cancellation of this transaction and this selling record will be carried out.

trade-info-written.title: On Order
trade-info-written.msg: Trading information was on sell order.

trade-complete.title: Trade Transaction Accepted
trade-complete.msg:
Trade transaction is submitted to ethereum network.
Updating the account balance may take half a minute
(until mined on the blockchain)
